sentences.sContent: Do we have a chromosome like that?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do we have a chromosome like that?
sentences.sCn: 那么我们真的有那么一条染色体么？

sentences.sContent: She is part of the chromosome of Kolkata.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is part of the chromosome of Kolkata.
sentences.sCn: 她就是加尔各答染色体的一部分。

sentences.sContent: The distances are additive along the length of the chromosome .
sentences.sContent_eng: The distances are additive along the length of the chromosome .
sentences.sCn: 其距离值就是沿着染色体长度方向的累加。

synos.tran: [染料][遗][细胞]染色体（形容词chromosomal，副词chromosomally）

phrases.pCn: n. [生]X染色体（性染色体的一种）
染色体加倍；染色体复制；染色体配对
染色体配对，染色体接合

remMethod.val: chrom(颜色) + o + som(体) + e → 染色体

words.tran: [生化] 色原；发色体，色原体

trans.tranOther: a part of every living cell that is shaped like a thread and contains the  gene s  that control the size, shape etc that a plant or animal has
